sentences.english: He is an undeservingly honored politician.
sentences.chinese: 他是个欺世盗名的政客。

sentences.english: He sails under false colous and he's just as likely to betray you.
sentences.chinese: 他是个欺世盗名的人，很可能背叛你。

sentences.english: Anyone who speaks in the name of others is always an imposter.
sentences.chinese: 以别人名义说话的人总是个欺世盗名者。
